name: ignitr
overview:
A boutique technology services company providing next generation Agile and continuous integration software testing resources. We primarily service Investment Banks and Hedge Fund clients, enabling quick and painless software implementation.

We provide proven, ultra-efficient ways to implement Financial Services software. We have deep business knowledge, specialising in FX, equities, derivatives and fixed income markets, full business stack (front, middle & back office).

We are experts at implementing Agile and Agile Acceptance Testing using the FitNesse automation framework. We only do software testing in the Continuous Integration, LEAN IT, Specification By Example and Test Driven Development spaces.
